name: Tata Neu Plus HDFC Bank Credit Card

joining.waiverCondition: Limited Time Offer: Lifetime Free for applications from Oct 1 to Dec 31, 2024 (digital/physical channels). Joining fee levied on 120th day of card issuance.
joining.note: Fee charged on 120th day from issuance

renewalWaiver.waiverText: Spend ₹1,00,000 or more before your renewal date to get annual fee waived

latePayment.note: Standard HDFC Bank late payment fee structure

overLimit.calculation: 2.5% of over-limit amount or ₹550, whichever is higher

cashAdvance.calculation: 2.5% of withdrawal amount or ₹500, whichever is higher

balanceTransferFee.calculation: 1% of transfer amount or ₹250, whichever is higher

existingRelationship.note: Existing HDFC Bank customers may get preferential treatment

creditLimit.factors: Based on income, credit score, existing relationship, and repayment history
creditLimit.enhancementCriteria: Good repayment history for 6+ months and increased income

gracePeriod.note: Up to 50 days interest-free period from transaction date if previous balance paid in full

minPayment.calculation: 5% of total outstanding or ₹200, whichever is higher

cashAdvance.note: Interest charged from date of withdrawal, no grace period

tataPartners.condition: On non-EMI spends at Tata Neu and partner Tata brands

otherSpends.condition: On non-Tata brand spends and merchant EMI transactions

rewards.earningText: Earn 2% NeuCoins on Tata partner brands, 1% on other spends. 1 NeuCoin = ₹1

additional5Percent.condition: On select categories on Tata Neu App/Website after registering for NeuPass
additional5Percent.restriction: Only via primary cardholder mobile number account
additional5Percent.note: Additional 5% NeuCoins on select categories via NeuPass membership

baseRate.note: 0.25% on all eligible UPI spends (posted by bank)

additionalRate.condition: On UPI payments via Tata Neu UPI ID

categories: Education payments via third-party apps (CRED, Cheq, MobiKwik)
exclusions.note: Education payments directly to school/college are eligible. EMI at merchant is eligible, post-transaction EMI conversion is not.

insurance.note: Changed from per day to per month cap

expiry.example: NeuCoins credited Aug 5, 2025 valid until Aug 31, 2026

existingCoins.note: Non-promotional NeuCoins earned before Aug 1, 2025 valid until July 31, 2026

promotional.note: Promotional/Welcome NeuCoins follow terms at issuance

welcome.maxClaimWindow: 180 days from statement date of eligible transaction
welcome.description: 499 NeuCoins on Tata Neu App (as reversal of 1st Year Membership Fees). Applicable on 1st transaction within 30 days of card issuance.
welcome.exclusion: Not applicable on Lifetime Free and First Year Free cards

tataPartners.note: 2% back on non-EMI spends at partner Tata brands

nonTata.note: 1% back on non-Tata brand spends and merchant EMI

fuel.note: No NeuCoins on fuel transactions. 1% surcharge waiver available.

groceries.note: Capped at 1000 NeuCoins per month (effective Jan 1, 2023)

utilities.note: Capped at 2000 NeuCoins per month (effective Sep 1, 2024)

telecom.note: Capped at 2000 NeuCoins per month (effective Sep 1, 2024)

insurance.note: Capped at 2000 NeuCoins per month (effective Jul 1, 2025). Changed from per day cap.

rent.note: Capped at 500 NeuCoins per month. Standard rental payments excluded.

bankPortal.note: This card uses NeuCoins system, not HDFC reward points. SmartBuy not applicable.

merchants.name: Tata Neu App Partners
merchants.note: Additional 5% on select categories via NeuPass registration

redemption.bestOption: Redemption on Tata Neu App for partner brand purchases

pointsPlusPay.note: Can combine NeuCoins with other payment methods on Tata Neu App

options.description: Redemption at Tata partner brands on Tata Neu App
options.note: 1 NeuCoin = ₹1. Best and only redemption option.

redemption.redemptionMethod: Select Tata Pay/NeuCoins/Loyalty Redemption as payment method on Tata Neu App/Website

transferPartners.note: NeuCoins can only be redeemed within Tata ecosystem. No external transfer partners.

pooling.note: NeuCoins are not poolable across cards or users

rewards.specialLogic: NeuCoins are credited within 7 working days of statement generation. Posting to Tata Neu account happens periodically.

spendRequired.note: Direct swipe access discontinued from midnight June 9, 2025. Now requires ₹50,000 spend per calendar quarter to earn 1 complimentary lounge voucher.

voucherDetails.notification: SMS/email within 30 working days after qualifying

feeIfNotQualified.note: ₹2 per entry if spend threshold not met

domestic.tracking: Via NetBanking → Credit Card → Redeem Reward Points → MyReward → Spend Promo Details
domestic.importantNote: Only new card spends count if card upgraded/lost/reissued. Net spends calculated (purchases minus reversals).

international.note: International lounge access not available on Tata Neu Plus. Available on Infinity variant only.

golf.note: Golf benefits not available on this card

movies.note: No dedicated movie offers on this card

dining.note: Earn NeuCoins at Qmin and IHCL properties as part of Tata ecosystem

fuel.note: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on transactions between ₹400-₹5,000. Maximum waiver ₹250 per statement cycle. No NeuCoins earned on fuel.

dynamicCurrencyConversion.recommendation: Always decline DCC and pay in local currency to avoid additional 1% + GST charge

forex.note: Forex markup applies to all non-INR transactions

concierge.note: Concierge services not included on entry-level card

roadsideAssistance.note: Roadside assistance not included on this card

noCostEMI.note: No-cost EMI available on select merchants and products

interestRates.note: Varies based on tenure and merchant

emi.note: Merchant EMI earns 1% NeuCoins. Post-transaction EMI conversion does not earn NeuCoins.

processingFee.note: 1% of transfer amount or ₹250, whichever is higher

balanceTransfer.note: Transfer balances from other bank cards

airlinePerks.note: Earn 2% NeuCoins at Air India Express. Redemption at Air India currently not available.

hotelPerks.note: Earn 2% NeuCoins at IHCL (Taj Hotels) and redeem NeuCoins for stays

fraudLiability.reportingWindow: Report within 7 days of unauthorized transaction
fraudLiability.note: Zero liability on fraudulent transactions if reported within 7 days

insurance.note: Limited insurance coverage on this entry-level card. Primary benefit is zero liability on fraudulent transactions if reported within 7 days.

contactless.note: Contactless payments up to ₹5,000 without PIN

walletSupport.note: RuPay variant supports UPI linking for enhanced rewards

upiLinking.rate: Up to 1% (0.25% base + 0.75% via Tata Neu UPI ID)
upiLinking.note: RuPay credit card UPI transactions earn NeuCoins

upgradesTo.cardName: Tata Neu Infinity HDFC Bank Credit Card
upgradesTo.note: Higher tier card with international lounge access and enhanced benefits

upgradePathway.note: Upgrade eligibility based on spend history, income, and relationship with bank

meta.bestFor: Users who frequently shop on Tata brands (BigBasket, Croma, Tata CLiQ, etc.) and want straightforward cashback with 1 NeuCoin = ₹1 value
meta.notRecommendedFor: Those who don't shop in Tata ecosystem, heavy fuel spenders, or those seeking premium travel benefits and international lounge access
meta.verdict: A solid entry-level co-branded card for Tata ecosystem loyalists. The 2% NeuCoins on Tata brands and 1% on other spends provide decent value, especially since 1 NeuCoin = ₹1. The RuPay variant offers UPI rewards which is a plus. However, the June 2025 lounge policy change requiring ₹50K quarterly spend significantly reduced the card's value for casual users. Multiple category caps also limit earning potential. Best suited for those who can maximize Tata brand spending and meet spend thresholds.
pros: 2% back on Tata partner brands is competitive
Additional 5% via NeuPass on select categories
UPI rewards on RuPay variant (up to 1%)
Low joining fee (₹499) with easy fee waiver (₹1L spend)
Wide Tata brand ecosystem for redemption
cons: Lounge access now requires ₹50K quarterly spend (major devaluation June 2025)
Multiple category caps limit earning (grocery 1000, utility 2000, insurance 2000/month)
NeuCoins only redeemable in Tata ecosystem
3.5% forex markup is high for international use

recentChanges.change: NeuCoins validity changed to 12 months from end of month credited
recentChanges.impact: Moderate - shorter validity requires more active redemption

recentChanges.change: Insurance NeuCoins cap changed from 2000/day to 2000/month
recentChanges.impact: High - significant devaluation for insurance premium payments

recentChanges.change: Online gaming (MCC-5816) excluded from NeuCoins earning
Domestic lounge access changed from direct swipe to milestone-based (₹50K quarterly spend)
recentChanges.impact: Very High - major devaluation for casual users

recentChanges.change: Additional 5% NeuCoins via NeuPass now requires primary cardholder mobile account
Utility and Telecom caps introduced at 2000 NeuCoins/month each

alternatives.reason: For international lounge access and higher benefits within Tata ecosystem
For Google Pay rewards and broader cashback without ecosystem lock-in
For Amazon-focused shopping with simpler reward structure
For Flipkart ecosystem users with unlimited 5% cashback

dataSource: Live From A Lounge (lounge policy updates)

changelog.change: Domestic lounge access policy changed - now requires ₹50,000 quarterly spend for 1 voucher per quarter
changelog.source: Official HDFC Bank T&C update, Live From A Lounge

changelog.change: NeuCoins validity changed to 12 months from end of month credited
Insurance cap changed from 2000/day to 2000/month; Online gaming excluded
Utility and Telecom caps of 2000 NeuCoins per month introduced
UPI rewards (0.25% + 0.75% via Tata Neu UPI ID) introduced for RuPay variant
Grocery cap of 1000 NeuCoins per month introduced; Rental payments excluded
